short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embed kanji into your everyday web browsing!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learning kanji doesn't have to be hard!
Enji will embed kanji into English words so you can learn passively during your everyday browsing. With settings for your exact level, it's never too much or too little.
Of course, you can disable Enji on any website you like.
